text:
@FLOTUS @WhiteHouse @POTUS Again, 120,000 Americans are dead from COVID-19 and the president ordered testing to be slowed down because big numbers would hurt him politically. 

There aren't words for this level of betrayal. https://t.co/sCdlJMfldf
